title: League Launcher stuck on Authentecating
body: I was in que for a game today and then suddenly  everything just froze. When i tried to relog it only said "Authentecating" for hours. I have tried restarting my intetnett, uninstall league, that new hextech repair tool,diffrent accounts, but nothing have worked so far. Does anyone have a good solution?

replies.body:
Hey there,

Could you try [switching to a public DNS](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq5) for me, let me know if this helps.
It got fixed overnight, i dont know how tho. Thanks for your time however
